## **Practical exercises**:

-  Download the Indice de Probreza Multidimensional (IPM) shapefile

-  Preprocess the shapefile to cover only your department

-  Add municipalities, population, roads, cities, and IPM layers to a new QGIS project

-  Define symbology for each layer (add labels as needed)

-  Make a map of IPM and colour print it 

**Make sure you bring the printed IPM map to the classroom on 7th May**
